name: Swish, the Swordfish
description:
-CONTROLS-

Movement: Left and Right arrows
Attack: [X] key
Block: [C] key
Jump: [Spacebar]

-ENEMIES-

Crab: These simple-minded fellas just meander about, clipping away at any blue sword-wielding fishies in their path.

Puffer: Hides in the water, and leaps out when an enemy approaches.  Watch out for its spikes!  You can either try to strike this foe before it protrudes its spikes, or you can block the spikes and then counterattack!

Pike: A fleet-footed soldier who will charge at you and attempt to impale you with its spear.  You can block the spear to stun them, or you can jump over their spear and slash them across their face!

Shark: Blocks your path with a mighty shield fitted with a sharp spike.  Jump over the shield and aim for its face, and try not to let it spike you!

Starfish: An assassin who excels in the ninja arts.  You can either block their ninja stars, or you can deflect them with a sword swipe.

Many thanks to Angelo Stanca for providing the music for this project!  You can find them on soundcloud through the link below:

https://soundcloud.com/user-841175693
